examples.text: Affirmative. That's what I'm looking for.
That is precisely what I was looking for

intents.description: Acknowledge that the response satisfies a question.

examples.text: Can we talk about something else?
Help me with this other question
Let us talk about something else
Can you say that again please?
I did not quite understand what you gave me
I didn't quite understand what you said
I don't understand what you're saying
Let's try to say that again more clearly, shall we?
What do you mean by that?
Are you still here with me?
Did you hear what I said?
Speak to me if you are there.

intents.description: Ask the bot to indicate that it is available.

examples.text: Hold on! I think I want to do it differently.
I didn't mean to do that actually, let's go back
Wait! Let's back up few steps and do that again

intents.description: Ask the bot to take one step back.

examples.text: I do not think it is the answer?
It is not what I want
It is not what I was looking for
That sounds like the wrong response
You did not understand what I asked
You did not understand what I said

intents.description: Indicate the bot's response does not address a question.

examples.text: Can you give me a moment?
Give me a few minutes to get together
I would like to put you on hold

intents.description: Indicate a delay in providing input to the bot.

examples.text: I want start from the beginning
I would like to start all over
Let's go back to square one
Let's pick this up from the top again.
One more time from the beginning
We will need to begin again
I don t know what you need
I don t know what you want
I have no idea what you are looking for
I m not certain I get what you re saying
I m not sure what will make you happy
To be honest, I m really not sure

intents.description: Indicate no definite answer to a question.

parameters.message: Hi, please fill out this registration form to see if you qualify for a Covid-19 test: https://www.cvs.com/minuteclinic/covid-assessment

values.text: You're eligible for for a COVID-19 test. Let's collect some preliminary information.

generic.title: Have you experienced any of these symptoms? Fever, chills, cough or sore throat. Headache, fatigue, Nausea or vomiting, Diarrhea, Loss of Taste, Muscle or Body aches, shortness of breath, or runny nose?

values.text: While you remain in the vehicle, you will be given a swab and asked to collect a sample of nasal secretions. This is done by inserting the swab into your nostril approximately 1 inch into the nasal passage (midway) with the most visible drainage or the nostril that is most congested if drainage is not present. The swab is rotated several times, removed gently and this process is repeated on the other side. Please note that you need to administer your own swab or bring someone that can do it for you.

generic.title: Here are the steps for performing the swab test:

values.text: Symptoms of Covid-19 are very similar to cold and flu like symptoms, with two major exceptions.
